blog.description: A place for me to posts whatever I wanted to. Such as updating my life, reviewing stuff, posting something smart or just yap about my life. All will be here.

whoAmI.content: I'm currently a Grade 9 student at Kophotuayngamwittaya School. I plan to continue my studies in Grades 10-12 at the same school, focusing on the Science-Mathematics program. I have a passion for front-end development and enjoy creating user-friendly web interfaces. I also have plans to make games, font, literally every digital art!
whoAmI.title: Who am I?

getInTouch.title: Get in Touch
getInTouch.content: I’d love to hear from you! Whether you have a question, a project in mind, or just want to connect, feel free to reach out. Let’s start a conversation and explore how we can work together.
